mutants.code:
def modulo(n, m):
    result = n
    mask = 2
    shiftedM = m
    while shiftedM <= n:
        shiftedM = shiftedM << 1
        mask = mask << 1
    mask = mask >> 1
    shiftedM = shiftedM >> 1
    while mask != 0:
        if result >= shiftedM:
            result -= shiftedM
        shiftedM = shiftedM >> 1
        mask = mask >> 1
    return result
